item.title: Israeli President to meet Albanese, Bondi victims on visit to Australia

item.title: Northern Territory students required to sing national anthem under new government directive

item.title: Australian dollar cracks 70 US cents on climb to three-year high
item.description: T﻿he local currency today was worth US70 cents, its highest since February 2023.

item.title: Melania Trump's $57 million documentary on track to bomb at the box office
item.description: A new movie is coming out starring one of the world's most famous people, but it doesn't seem like anyone cares.

item.description: T﻿he shooting took place on the US-Mexico border in Arizona, according to local law enforcement.

item.description: T﻿he dramatic moment was caught on video on Australia Day.

item.title: Airports bring in screening measures after potentially fatal Nipah virus detected in India
item.description: Airports across Asia are bringing in tighter screening measures after two people contracted Nipah virus.

item.description: William Swale was among the dozens of witnesses called to give evidence at an inquest into the Daylesford pub crash.

item.title: 'Doesn't make any sense': Forgotten HECS debt detail putting a delay on money in your pocket
item.description: If you've forgotten to tell your employer to stop garnishing your wages for fully-paid HECS debts, you need to act fast.

item.title: Former PM Scott Morrison criticised over calls to regulate Islamic preachers in Australia
item.description: Muslim leaders have condemned the former prime minister for being "deeply ill-informed".

item.description: MP Colin Boyce announced this morning that he will challenge Littleproud for the leadership of their party.

item.title: Former French senator admits to serving lawmaker a drink laced with MDMA, but he claims it was an accident
item.description: He said he put the white powder into a glass intended for himself the night before but did not use it, then mistakenly served the same glass to the victim the next day.

item.title: Driver accused of killing promising young lawyer dies
item.description: Zisi Kokotatsios allegedly ran over 28-year-old lawyer Mitch East while driving through Tamarama in Sydney's east and failing to stop to help.

item.description: Kristi Noem has dominated ﻿news headlines and social media feeds this month, but where did she come from?

item.description: H﻿e had been fresh out of prison for attempted cocaine smuggling.

item.title: International manhunt for man accused of throwing hot coffee on baby ramps up after 18 months
item.description: The baby was on a picnic with his mother at Hanlon Park in Stones Corner when a man approached and poured hot coffee on the infant about midday on August 27, 2024.

item.description: A beloved grandfather has been identified as the passenger killed in yesterday's light plane crash north of the Gold Coast.

item.description: Reality is about to smack millions of us in the face, and it could start as early as next week.

item.description: Mining giant BHP has consolidated its new crown as Australia's most valuable company, a day after knocking off the country's biggest bank at the top of the stock exchange.

item.description: Dozens of houseboat residents and boat owners are facing imminent eviction from a popular Queensland river following the introduction of an anchoring time limit.

item.title: Today in History - January 29: Teen girl's chilling reason for gunning down eight schoolchildren
item.description: A 16-year-old girl opened fire on a primary school on January 29, 1979, injuring eight children and killing two adults.

item.description: T﻿he car struck the pair in Ormeau Hills close to 6pm yesterday, with both the woman and infant now in hospital.
